sentences.en: After scoring over my calmness in this graphic way he nodded wisely.
sentences.cn: 他以如此形象逼真的动作吓了我以后,便狡黠地朝我点点头.

sentences.en: But not all the money, to put it mildly, has been used wisely.
sentences.cn: 但是说得委婉一些，并不是所有的钱都花得很明智。

sentences.en: He never behaves honestly, nor wisely.
sentences.cn: 他的行为既不诚实, 也不聪明.

sentences.en: He wisely contented himself with his family and his love of nature.
sentences.cn: 他非常明智，拥有家庭和对自然的热爱便知足了。

sentences.en: If you command wisely, you'll be obeyed cheerfully.
Not all the money, to put it mildly, has been used wisely.
sentences.cn: 说得好听些，不是所有的钱都花得是地方。

sentences.en: Our man had wisely decided to be picked up at the farm.
sentences.cn: 我们头儿作出了英明决定——让人来农场接他。

sentences.en: Please use what you have wisely.
sentences.cn: 请明智地花费你所拥有的。

sentences.en: She had wisely smartened herself up.
sentences.cn: 她很聪明地把自己修饰打扮了一番。

sentences.en: She is always hard up because she doesn't lay out her money wisely.
sentences.cn: 她总是缺钱花,因为她胡乱花钱.

sentences.en: Sian had very wisely left the party before all the trouble started.
sentences.cn: 沙恩很明智地在一切麻烦开始之前就离开了那个聚会。

sentences.en: The King ruled his people well and wisely.
sentences.cn: 这位国王贤明地统治着他的臣民.

sentences.en: The minister was tasked with checking that British aid money was being spent wisely.
sentences.cn: 部长被指派去督查英国的援助资金是否已用到实处。

sentences.en: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
sentences.cn: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

sentences.en: The three of us stood around the machine nodding wisely.
sentences.cn: 我们三人站在机器周围，若有所悟地点着头。
他们已经把钱作了明智的投资。

words.tran_cn: 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言
